Job Posting: 178111 - Position: S26 Data Intern - Enterprise Analytics - Summer 2026 178111 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 02/13/2026 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 02/06/2026 11:41 AM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 Address Line 2 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country 1Password 4711 Yonge Street 10th Floor Toronto M2N 6K8 ON Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode 2026 - Summer S26 Data Intern - Enterprise Analytics - Summer 2026 178111 Co-op Position Remote Canada or USA 4 months Fully Remote Salary Currency CAD Salary Job Description About 1Password Salary Not Available, 0 Major List At 1Password, we're building the foundation for a safe, productive digital future. Our mission is to unleash employee productivity without compromising security by ensuring every identity is authentic, every application sign-in is secure, and every device is trusted. We innovated the market-leading enterprise password manager and pioneered Extended Access Management, a new cybersecurity category built for the way people and AI agents work today. As one of the most loved brands in cybersecurity, we take a human-centric approach in everything from product strategy to user experience. Over 180,000 businesses, from Fortune 100 leaders to the world's most innovative AI companies, trust 1Password to help their teams securely adopt the SaaS and AI tools they need to do their best work. Opportunity available here: Data Intern - Enterprise Analytics - Summer 2026 @ 1Password N/A Citizenship Requirement APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Special Application Instructions Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Application Link: Data Intern - Enterprise Analytics - Summer 2026 @ 1Password Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
